text: Hear My Song is a 1991 Irish British comedy movie directed by first time director Peter Chelsom and starring Ned Beatty, Adrian Dunbar, Tara Fitzgerald, David McCallum, Shirley Anne Field, James Nesbitt, John Dair. It was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:Irish comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Chelsom
title: Hear My Song
